column4: I want to install http://www.backports.org/debian/pool/main/g/git-core/git-core_1.5.3.2-1~bpo40+2_i386.deb - how do i do so properly?
you shouldn't use debian packages on ubuntu...
if you really need that version, you rather build from source
http://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/git-1.5.3.4.tar.gz is git latest. Can I build it the "ubuntu" way ? How would i do that?
